body:
@andymikulski, @chartjes, @rehandalal: I'd like to wait to merge this until everyone is ready for Python 3.6 available. That will mean installing Python 3.6 and re-making your virtualenv. Once you have done that (and don't run into any other problems with this branch) can you approve this PR?

We're not going to merge this until after the next release anyways, so no rush.

body_html:
